meanings.definition: A notice of a death, especially in a newspaper.
meanings.sent1: The obituary in the paper informed everyone of the sad news.
meanings.sent2: She read the obituary to learn about her late neighbor.
meanings.sent3: The obituary made the whole town realize how fragile life is.
meanings.sent4: His obituary painted a picture of a life well-lived.
meanings.sent5: The obituary served as a reminder to cherish every moment.

meanings.definition: A published account of a person's life and death.
meanings.sent1: The obituary detailed all the important events in his life.
meanings.sent2: Reading her obituary made me appreciate her even more.
meanings.sent3: The obituary was like a storybook of memories.
meanings.sent4: Her obituary was a testament to the impact she had on others.
meanings.sent5: The obituary captured the essence of who he was.
